# admiralty-skip-link



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                 | Type     | Default           |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------------- |
| `href`   | `href`    | The HTML ID that the skip link will jump to when activated. | `string` | `'#main-content'` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                | Description                   |
| ----------------------------------- | ----------------------------- |
| `--admiralty-skip-link-font-size`   | Font size for the skip link   |
| `--admiralty-skip-link-font-weight` | Font weight for the skip link |
